channel.title: cryptography on Security engineering by vixentael
channel.description: Recent content in cryptography on Security engineering by vixentael

item.title: Crypto AMA with Anastasiia Voitova, Ruslan Kiyanchuk and Mark Carney
item.description: We’re speaking about cryptography and explain why base64 is our favourite cipher!

item.title: Use cryptography; don’t learn it
item.description: We’ll talk about “boring crypto”: why developers shouldn’t spend time learning all the details of crypto-algorithms (or invent new ones).
